ygData.subject: Burynai Bundt Cake Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, have we made any progress on this quest yet? I have been asking in guildchat if anyone has foraged a Burynai Bundt Cake in Field of Bone.  The answer I got
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, have we made any progress on this quest yet?

I have been asking in guildchat if anyone has foraged a Burynai Bundt Cake
in Field of Bone. The answer I got was "yes, what's it for?", to which I
replied a Bardic equipment quest. Well as it turns out it was not the
guildmate that had foraged it, it was a Guide on our server that had. [This
Guide is a really colorful and likeable gnome that frequently pops into
Hate, Sky, etc. and runs around entertaining us.] The Guide apparently
asked our guildmates who had been nearby if they knew what the heck a
Burynai Bundt Cake was for. I haven't seen the Guide online recently, but
if/when I do I'll try and squeeze some info out of him about his forage
skill and where he might have foraged such a thing. Unfortunately, if he's
smart he won't tell me. ;-/

[51 Minstrel] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work
